Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/State

How does this affect my trip?

Headline: Purple Line Service Delayed at Linden
ShortDescription: Purple Line Service trains are standing at Linden due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line Service trains are standing at Linden due to a sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
